title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling new call controls with Survivable Branch Appliance
description:
In the event of a network outage, users will now have
access to new call controls with Survivable Branch Appliance. Users will now be
able to use contact search, dial by name, and initiate a call from their call
history. When connected to the same SBA and network, VoIP calls to peers will
be routed through PSTN if the call recipient has an associated phone number.
